_sText:
Novelties :

- There are not walls anymore by which we can see through and fire.
- The lights of the small towers are already switched off and buttons were deleted.
- We can now fire on the button of gases and on the big red buttons, which activate too gases.
- When gases are activated, railings traps the player in the room down.
- There are flashes of lighting which touch the lightning conductor and electrify the ground down from the big tower.
- Footbridges enter the big tower and 4 small towers are anymore visible and are better protected.
- Traps are actionable (by firing on 3 buttons) at the top of every footbridge and which make roll a big coal nut on the aimed footbridge. Furthermore, these coal nuts block the access of footbridges when they arrive in the rear.
- There is a big subterranean creusable gallery, like "Minecraft"!
- Below the map, there is a new danger zone with the lava and numerous automatic traps!
- There is a teleport below the map (in the zone of lava) which brings the player at the top of the main tower. As soon as the player touches this new teleport, a flash of lighting appears and electrifies the ground down from the main tower.
- At the top of the main tower, there is 2 awp, 4 smokes and 4 small zones where we can better see the rest of the map.
- The lighting of the map was improved, but with a darker sky.
